text.text:
At Tata Capital, we commit to making your borrowing journey a smooth ride. Gone are the days of lengthy application processes and hefty paperwork. We bring you a range of tailored personal loan options with simple eligibility criteria and minimal documentation. All you need to do is provide the required documents, including your KYC documents, along with proof of employment and income.

 

So, whether you want to fund your childâ€™s education or explore the world, you can have instant access to funds with Tata Capital!

 

Here, you will find all details about documents required for education loan, documents required for personal loan, marriage loan documents, documents required for personal loan for salaried person, home renovation loan documents, etc.
Instant & paperless Personal Loan of upto â‚¹1,00,000

item_1671182759452.cq:panelTitle: Who can avail a Personal Loan?

text.text: Personal loan can be availed by those who meet the following eligibility criteria:

popular_faq_descript_200750825.jcr:title: Monthly Incomeâ€“must be at least Rs. 15,000 per month.

popular_faq_descript_1717367127.jcr:title: Job Stabilityâ€“The applicant must be in the same job for the past six months.

popular_faq_descript_1283418988.jcr:title: Work Experienceâ€“The applicant must have a minimum of one year of work experience.

item_1671182794032.cq:panelTitle: What are the documents required for Personal Loan?

text.text: The documents needed to avail of a personal loan depend on the purpose of your loan. For example,

item_1671182842904.cq:panelTitle: What are the documents needed for Personal Loan for self-employed?

text.text: The following are documents required for personal loan eligibility by self-employed individuals â€“

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Proof of Existence of Businessâ€“Tax Registration copy/Company Registration License/Shop Establishment Proof

popular_faq_descript_2140895260.jcr:title: Identity Proof documentsâ€“Passport/Voterâ€™s ID/PAN Card/Driving Licens

popular_faq_descript_238767962.jcr:title: Residence Proof documentsâ€“Passport/Aadhar Card/Utility Bill/Ration Card

popular_faq_descript_1398810579.jcr:title: Bank Account Statementsâ€“Savings and Current account statements for the past one year

popular_faq_descript_48870029.jcr:title: Income Tax Returns filed for the preceding year

item_1671182856999.cq:panelTitle: How can a self-employed person get a Personal Loan?

text.text: A self-employed person can get a personal loan with Tata Capital by meeting the following eligibility criteria â€“

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: The applicantâ€™s age must be between 22 to 58 years

popular_faq_descript_1530875188.jcr:title: The applicant must have a monthly income of at least Rs.15,000

popular_faq_descript_211221741.jcr:title: The applicant must have at least one year of work experience

item_1671182872895.cq:panelTitle: What is the minimum salary required for availing of a Personal Loan?

text_copy.text: The minimum salary requirement for availing of a personal loan with Tata Capital is Rs. 15,000.

item_1671182885681.cq:panelTitle: What document proofs do you need for availing of a Personal Loan?

text_copy.text: The following are the basic personal loan documents you need for availing of a loan:

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Photo Identity Proofâ€“Copy of your Voterâ€™s ID/Passport/Driving License/Aadhar Card

popular_faq_descript_1706122490.jcr:title: Income Proofâ€“Copy of past six monthsâ€™ bank statements

popular_faq_descript_505670141.jcr:title: Address Proofâ€“Copy of your Ration Card/Electricity Bill/Passport

popular_faq_descript_608524888.jcr:title: Salary Slipsâ€“Copy of your past three monthsâ€™ salary slips

popular_faq_descript_787458372.jcr:title: Employment Certificateâ€“stating one year of continuous employment

item_1671182897102.cq:panelTitle: What are the documents needed for Education Loan?

text.text: Here is the education loan documents list you need to produce:

popular_faq_descript.jcr:title: Photo Identity Proofâ€“Copy of your Voterâ€™s ID/Passport/Driving License/Aadhar Card

popular_faq_descript_2077397427.jcr:title: Last three months' salary slips & ITR of Parent/Guarantor

popular_faq_descript_50884970.jcr:title: Education loan documents for studying abroad

popular_faq_descript_232017893.jcr:title: Student loan documents regarding employment details (if employed)

Want to fund your vacation but falling short on funds? An EMI based loan can be an ideal way to pay for a holiday that you canâ€™t quite cover in one go.

Tata Capital Personal Loan for Travel is how you can make it happen. Head off on your next adventure.
